Captavi is an excellent company to partner with for all your digital marketing needs.  From website design to email marketing, they do it all!  I really appreciate their awesome and prompt customer service.  When you start a project with them, they stick with you through every detail until it is complete!  They not only help solve problems that may arise but they also have a wealth of resources and ideas to teach you how to solve problems yourself.  They are constantly improving platforms in response to customers' needs and really strive to create a seamless and easy workflow for all projects.

I do not have an IT background so sometimes the technical aspects are a bit confusing for me.  The customer support however is amazing and completely makes up for my own lack of knowledge.  I know they always have my back and more importantly, are not afraid to teach me what I need to know!

Captavi's team of developers have helped us tremendously, and the Captavi platform for managing our website is very user-friendly and intuitive. What do you dislike about Captavi Platform?

Recommendations to others considering Captavi Platform:
The Captavi technical support team is really fantastic. We receive immediate responses, and our contacts with Captavi are always willing to help teach us about how to use features, or walk us through if we get stuck on something. The Captavi support team is excellent.

What problems is Captavi Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Captavi has been instrumental in bringing our complex company offerings to the public in a palatable and compelling way.
